text: Goodsports is an Australian children's television series, produced by WIN Television in Hobart, Tasmania. The half-hour show premiered in 1991, and was broadcast on WIN Television each Saturday morning at 7.30am, and 9:30am nationally on the Nine Network. Despite being axed in 2000, WIN Television continued to air repeats of Goodsports at 3:30pm weekdays until 2007. __TOC__ ==See also== * WIN Television * WIN Corporation ==References== == External links == * Official Website Category:WIN Television original programming Category:Australian children's television series Category:Television shows set in Tasmania Category:1991 Australian television series debuts Category:2000 Australian television series endings
title: Goodsports
